i18n.noPirze: you didn't place any bet this round
i18n.noOne: Unfortunately, No one win this game
i18n.rule1: 1. Please choose the amount of the food you would like to bet on and all winners bet on the winning food will get the corresponding golds.
i18n.rule2: 2. The time for betting is 40 seconds each round.
i18n.rule3: 3. You can bet on up to 6 kinds of food each round. There is no limit for the amount you bet.
i18n.rule7: 7. This game is not affiliated with Apple Inc.
i18n.rewardTips: Please pay attention to check your reward
i18n.Users: Users with the most daily bets can get the cars sent by the Oohla platform, and the top three daily get the right to use the cars for 7 days.
